LanguageData.XFMParmor_ArcticWind.label: arctic gale
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ArcticWind.description: When under effect of the arctic gale, the victim's body will be torn apart rapidly. Blood spilling from the wounds may also freeze into sharp fragments, harming anyone in proximity.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Freeze.label: frozen
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Freeze.description: More wounds may be tore up from frozen bodies.The frozen status will be spread to pawns nearby upon death.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Frostbite.label: frostbite
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Frostbite.description: Tears and wounds caused by external damage acting on frozen tissues.
